headline: Bound Together by Their Boston Neighborhood
abstract: Linda Walczak had some advice for her husband, Bill, before she died: Meg Campbell was someone he should consider as a potential love interest. She was right.
lead_paragraph: When Bill Walczak called Meg Campbell to ask her for a date in 2016, he hung up happy. The yes he had received wasnâ€™t particularly enthusiastic, but her hesitant acceptance gave him a lift anyway. Spending time with Ms. Campbell, he knew, would be good for him. His wife had told him so.
